a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Number of people with alcohol use disorders by region
Total number of people with an alcohol use disorder, by region. This is measured across all ages and both
sexes. Alcohol dependence is defined by the International Classification of Diseases as the presence of three
or more indicators of dependence for at least a month within the previous year.
Data source: IHME, Global Burden of Disease (2024)
